tags: we all have our liked ships
dont attack others just because you disagree with their pairing
summary: I’m all here for Thor x Carol.
body:
I’m all here for Thor x Carol.

If you ship her with women or another guy, cool.

If you ship him with men or another woman, cool.

Respect my ship like I respect yours and we’ll be gravy.

reblog.comment:
I’m all here for Thor x Carol.

If you ship her with women or another guy, cool.

If you ship him with men or another woman, cool.

Respect my ship like I respect yours and we’ll be gravy.

trail.content_raw:
I’m all here for Thor x Carol.

If you ship her with women or another guy, cool.

If you ship him with men or another woman, cool.

Respect my ship like I respect yours and we’ll be gravy.
trail.content:
I’m all here for Thor x Carol.

If you ship her with women or another guy, cool.

If you ship him with men or another woman, cool.

Respect my ship like I respect yours and we’ll be gravy.

summary: WATCH: "Whatever It Takes" -- Marvel Drops New Trailer for Avengers: Endgame
title: WATCH: "Whatever It Takes" -- Marvel Drops New Trailer for Avengers: Endgame
body:
WATCH: “Whatever It Takes” — Marvel Drops New Trailer for Avengers: Endgame

It’s perhaps no surprise that Marvel is not doling out much in the way of plot in the ramp-up for Avengers: Endgame. The latest trailer, like the one before it, leans heavy on sad heroes promising vague action. But what it does have? Fashion.

(more…)

View On WordPress

summary: Carol: When people get a little too chummy with me, I like to call them by the wrong name to let them know I don’t really care...
body:
Carol: When people get a little too chummy with me, I like to call them by the wrong name to let them know I don’t really care about them.

Thor: That’s a genius move.

Carol: Thank you Thot.

title: Captain Marvel (2019) Review
body:
Alright, so I’m behind on my blog posts because I’ve been in a funk for the last week. But, this one couldn’t wait any longer.

I saw Captain Marvel the day it was released, which also happened to be International Women’s Day. And, I honestly can’t think of a better day for this film to have been released. It was a solid film, all together. Was it the best Marvel film? No. But, it was an important one, not just in story line for Marvel but for viewers, as well.

I’ve written before about how important and groundbreaking…

View On WordPress

summary: "I like this one " Thor honey no. It doesn't matter. Really doesn't matter whether you like her or not. She has NOTHING to prove...
body: “I like this one ” Thor honey no. It doesn’t matter. Really doesn’t matter whether you like her or not. She has NOTHING to prove to anyone let alone you. You don’t get to size her up and say “I like this one” like she’s a newbie needing your approval. She doesn’t care for your approval. Your very own title of avenger comes from her. Don’t try to measure your dick with her. She would win.

reblog.comment: “I like this one ” Thor honey no. It doesn’t matter. Really doesn’t matter whether you like her or not. She has NOTHING to prove to anyone let alone you. You don’t get to size her up and say “I like this one” like she’s a newbie needing your approval. She doesn’t care for your approval. Your very own title of avenger comes from her. Don’t try to measure your dick with her. She would win.

trail.content_raw: “I like this one ” Thor honey no. It doesn’t matter. Really doesn’t matter whether you like her or not. She has NOTHING to prove to anyone let alone you. You don’t get to size her up and say “I like this one” like she’s a newbie needing your approval. She doesn’t care for your approval. Your very own title of avenger comes from her. Don’t try to measure your dick with her. She would win.
trail.content: “I like this one ” Thor honey no. It doesn’t matter. Really doesn’t matter whether you like her or not. She has NOTHING to prove to anyone let alone you. You don’t get to size her up and say “I like this one” like she’s a newbie needing your approval. She doesn’t care for your approval. Your very own title of avenger comes from her. Don’t try to measure your dick with her. She would win.

summary: Disney decide recontratar a James Gunn para Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
title: Disney decide recontratar a James Gunn para Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
body:
Disney decide recontratar a James Gunn para Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

Deadline informa que Disney ha reincorporado a James Gunn como escritor y director de Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3, y según el escritor responsable, ha confirmado la información con Marvel y representantes de Gunn.

La decisión de volver a contratar a Gunn fue considerada y hecha en realidad hace meses, luego de conversaciones con líderes de los estudios Disney y el equipo de Marvel Studios.…

View On WordPress

summary: Captain Marvel Fans Upset Brie Larson Wears Makeup in Avengers: Endgame Trailer!
title: Captain Marvel Fans Upset Brie Larson Wears Makeup in Avengers: Endgame Trailer!
body:
Captain Marvel Fans Upset Brie Larson Wears Makeup in Avengers: Endgame Trailer!

A number of Captain Marvel fans are upset that Brie Larson’s character is wearing makeup in the new Avengers: Endgame trailer.

Following the first weekend of Captain Marvel out in theaters, Marvel releaed a new Avengers: Endgame trailerthat features Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel interacting with the Avengers. A number of fans took issue with the fact that Larson’s Carol Danvers is wearing…

summary: Avengers: Endgame: Mark Ruffalo Gets Snapped Out of Existence After Discussing Spoilers on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy...
title: Avengers: Endgame: Mark Ruffalo Gets Snapped Out of Existence After Discussing Spoilers on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
body:
Avengers: Endgame: Mark Ruffalo Gets Snapped Out of Existence After Discussing Spoilers on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon

Mark Ruffalo, who plays Bruce Banner and the Hulk in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, appeared on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon where he was snapped out of existence after discussing spoilers for Avengers: Endgame.

Jimmy Fallon hooked Mark Ruffalo up to a lie detector test and began grilling the actor on Avengers: Endgame.

Fallon asks Ruffalo if the Hulk is a Skrull, if there are any clues…

View On WordPress
